testcase.name: Logged user could add different products to Shopping cart
testcase.system-out: Given user add mobile to cart then clicks on the product apple macbook......passed When user add it to the shopping cart.......................................passed Then item is added to the shopping cart and a confirmation message will be shown.passed

testcase.name: SC11- Logged user could add different products to compare list
testcase.system-out: Given user clicks on the product apple macbook..............................passed When user added it to compare list..........................................passed Then user can add this item to the compare list and a confirmation message will be shown.passed

testcase.name: Logged User could switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.system-out: When user selects currency drop list and chooses Euro.......................passed Then the price of the product appears in Euro...............................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to login
testcase.name: user login with valid username and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user enter valid username and password.................................passed Then user could login successfully..........................................passed

testcase.name: Create successful Order
testcase.system-out: Given user add apple macbook to shopping cart...............................passed When user go to shopping cart...............................................passed And update the shopping cart................................................passed And should continue with order..............................................passed And enters the shipping address and payment.................................passed Then user could order his product successfully..............................passed

testcase.name: user could register with valid data
testcase.failure:

testcase.name: user could be able to recover password by clicking on forgot password
testcase.system-out: Given user click on forgot password.........................................passed When enter his or her email.................................................passed Then user receives a link and recover password..............................passed

testcase.classname: users will be able to search for products with different parameters
testcase.name: user could search for product using fullname
testcase.system-out: When user clicks on search field............................................passed And user search with name of product........................................passed Then user could find relative results.......................................passed

testcase.name: Logged user could select different Categories
testcase.system-out: When user hover at computer category and selects notebook...................passed Then user could see notebooks...............................................passed

testcase.name: Logged user could select different tags
testcase.system-out: When user navigates to Apparel & shoes......................................passed Then user navigates to awesome tag..........................................passed And user could find all products under the awesome tag......................passed
